text: How can I include page numbers in the quote when we download the file? I see that we have a page number for the print file, but there is no page number in the footer for the downloaded PDF. I attempted to do so using "jspdf," but for "jspdf" samples we can not divide the quotation content text by page number. Is there another way?
The search bar got an update, not for the better though:

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Question for all developers who have used an SMS API service and can comment on how they like using them. Examples: Twillio, Vonage, etc.

What is your strategy when creating a private app to use for the secret token with workflow custom code actions secrets.  Do you create one app per workflow secret, or do you use a single app for multiple workflows using custom coded actions?  Some other strategy?
I like to create a secret per app because then I can see the HTTP traffic and I know when there are issues with the particular workflow more easily.
If it lives in the same workflow I use the same app.
I have also been lazy and used more than one for them thing before because eh……

we are providing HubSpot as integration , so that our user will able to integrate HubSpot with our product , so their data that have on our platform will be send to HubSpot also from our product ,
we are using contact and contact timeline on the behalf of user .

user need to buy plan for adding integration of HubSpot and our product , we are using oauth 2.0 to access api on our user behalf and send data to huspot , so i want to know
1.we also need to pay anytype of charge in this, for using oauth 2.0 on user behalf ,
2.is it compulsory to list our app on HubSpot for integration to work in production , because right now in our integration section we provide user to login from their and integration will be done and its working also.
 	
our product is simliar to appcues or chameleon
